title: Acacia Wood Heart Shaped Bowls - Fair Trade, Sustainably Harvested (10")
description: Hand-carved in the Philippines from sustainably harvested acacia wood and treated with certified food safe finish.
Each piece of our acacia wood collection is hand-crafted at a small family-run workshop outside of Manila in the Philippines.
